author: orfeusnetwork
title: Cardano-based Travel Network
description: 佣金使旅行服务更加昂贵，而缺乏病毒保护的保证导致世界旅行的急剧下降。

f6_assessments.q0: 你好，Ada投票者 !这个提议是 "促进Cardano上的Defi "挑战的一部分我相信这个建议的想法和全面实施无疑会促进卡达诺的Defi，原因如下。正如我喜欢说的那样，Defi目前正处于起步阶段，Defi与现实世界的产业和资产之间的联系仍然相当不发达。我们在Defi中看到许多项目没有现实世界的使用案例，或者没有底层现实世界资产的支持，而这些资产的市值有时达到数十亿美元。这个提议对Cardano上的Defi很重要的原因是，它创造了多个Defi用例，由现实世界的用例和合同支持，可以被视为资产。这些用例是围绕旅游行业的。可以说，defi的一个核心原则也是自由市场机会。在这个提案中，我们看到cbtn（基于Cardano的旅游网络）旨在创建的平台如何为买卖旅游合同提供流动性。想象一下，如果你在2022年3月买了一个去夏威夷的旅行，那就是2022年12月的。如果你能在预订高峰期之前提前以折扣价购买合同，这可以让你在2022年11月以高价出售你的旅行。这个例子使用的是夏威夷，我不确定这个平台是否适用于夏威夷的旅行，但只是把它作为一个例子，说明以这些旅行合同为中心的defi套利潜力。  此外，这个建议对链上旅游市场可能产生的影响也很丰富。我所举的例子是我所看到的这个提案在促进Cardano上的Defi方面可以做的许多事情之一，所以就影响而言，我给它打了5分。
f6_assessments.q1:
因此，当我调查这两个团队成员Videlina Gandeva和Pavlina Deleva时，我发现他们在twitter上的社交活动并不多，他们在2021年9月同时开始了twitter，如果我有正确的手柄https://twitter.com/VGandeva & https://twitter.com/DelevaPavlina。我确实发现帕瓦利娜已经填写了她的链接简历，而且确实与tripxv有关。她的简历是 "下一代TripXv和ClubXchain平台的管理员。
技术和创新公司PLC的营销团队成员
网络媒体cluborfei.com的副主编
妇女电子领导力协会（WELI）成员" 我发现这种联系对研究很重要，因为就上述建议的实施而言，tripxv是其计划的中心。据我所知，如果这是真的，她是Tripxv的管理员，那么这个提案应该得到可信的回报，这将有助于使这个提案更具有可行性。硬币的另一面是，我希望他们能在提案中提供更多关于他们团队及其与Tripxy关系的细节，因为他们要求的金额与整个挑战赛的资金相比是很高的。他们要求的金额几乎占整个基金的20%。我还认为，重要的是要看他们计划如何使用这8万块钱，而在提案中，他们几乎没有给出关于这8万块钱将用在哪里/如何使用的细节。我想把这一建设性的批评意见作为反馈，让团队展示资金将如何使用以及用在何处。我认为这有点动摇了我对提案可行性的信心，这就是为什么我必须给这部分打3分的原因。我认为这个想法和 "推销 "是伟大的，但由于所要求的金额，我希望看到与 "如何实施提案 "方面有更大的联系。
f6_assessments.q2: 对于这部分审查，我们喜欢看资金的使用方式和提案中的时间表/关键指标，因为这关系到提案是否可以被审计。时间线不是很透明，因为我们没有一步步完成平台的日期。这不能被审计，因为完成的计划步骤并没有明确的阐述。然而，关键指标为我们提供了短期的东西，我们可以审计，如提案中提到的改进、发展和营销。我们可能能够衡量这些东西，所以我将在我的分数中奖励这些东西。我们也有一个关键的衡量标准，即 "第一年有10万个旅游点和100万游客在网络上注册"，我们可以在一年后进行审计。我认为，当我们考虑是否可以审计资金的执行情况时，如前所述，我们缺乏透明度，所以很难给审计得分超过2分，因为要求的金额很多，而且能够审计资金将是超级重要的，我认为对于催化剂如何发放赠款的未来。我对团队的反馈是，请围绕这些资金的使用方式和实施时间表，以及你们团队的资质和与所述合作伙伴的关系，增加透明度。我还建议增加一节，围绕你们需要获得哪些其他的人力资源，而你们没有或拥有这些资源，以实施该提案。人力资源，如开发人员和这些性质的东西，这将真正有助于给你的建议更多的内容。我的最后一个反馈是，也许可以给出短期目标，我们可以进行审计，如1个月，3个月，6个月等...。我真的希望这个团队好运，并将关注他们，因为我认为这个想法真的很酷，如果成功实施，将肯定有助于促进Cardano的Defi。
f6_assessments.reply:
Hello, thanks for the evaluation and recommendations. Attaching additional information about the team leader Videlina Gandeva – Wikipedia: https://bg.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%92%D0%B8%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%BD%D0%B0_%D0%93%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%B0 
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/tic.plovdiv . 
We will be happy to take a look at our White Paper, on the basis of which we have described the Catalyst project - budget and roadmap https://orfeusnet.eu/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/000_WhitePaper_ORFEUS-Network_EN_07.12.2021.pdf

f6_assessments.q0: In the Covid-stricken world it's commendable that you still try to run a travel business. Perhaps there was something "lost in translation" but for me it was quite difficult to understand the model you are proposing.
f6_assessments.q1: Usually a video is made to illustrate/explain/simplify/summarize a complex written proposal. This time, I'm sorry to say, it just created more confusion. The model you are proposing might be really good. It just needs some polishing and the language needs to be checked by a native English speaker. Also, if you're focusing on India as the source of clients, it would make sense to have a Catalyst member from India to join your team. I hope you re-submit the proposal in Fund8.
f6_assessments.q2:
"100 000 tourist sites and 1 million tourists registered in the network in the first year"... really?

It seems you already have these tripxv and clubxchain domains. How many tourists are now coming through those? How would the numbers suddenly jump up if you enabled ADA payments? This is not very convincing.
f6_assessments.reply:
Thanks for the evaluation and recommendations. In fact, we offer combining the idea of Booking and Facebook by creating a Cardano Network of two travel platforms, one financial and one app. The difference from all reservation systems so far is the built-in community and the ability to prevent irregularities related to hygiene in the sites through the presence of files. Regarding Indian partners, our team has been working with the Indian community in Bulgaria for many years. We are members and founders of the Bulgarian-Indian Technology Forum "Mahatma Gandhi" / www.bit-forum.org /. We will follow your recommendation and add a member of the Indian Catalyst to our team. We agree that the video was made quite quickly. For the needs of marketing we plan to attract professionals. Perhaps the White Paper Orfeus Network, which we are currently working on, will provide more clarity. We attach a link to it and we hope you look at it - https://orfeusnet.eu/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/000_WhitePaper_ORFEUS-Network_EN_07.12.2021.pdf .
Regarding the figures of registered sites and tourists, digital nomads and student communities are our main target group for community formation. We will distribute the mobile application through our partners in India and China, mainly student communities and universities. In our opinion, they are the most powerful community tool for raising interest in our network and we will be able to start it the fastest. The funds for marketing and specialist in the field are our most crucial. We also intend to implement AI in preparation for the Meta Reality and we believe that with the concept of community in TripXv we are approaching the transition of tourism to a new level - travel at any time, even while at home.

f6_assessments.q0:
Interesting idea, yet it feels like a booking.com or a similar website on a blockchain. 

If that is correct, it might be difficult to attract new people from these used procedures.

Nevertheless, it is in accordance with the challenge goal and if they manage to deliver that many users as they plan to, it will definitely impact the Cardano blockchain and defi space.

The only thing to be solved - 1% of their income is put to the community fund - 

a. 1% might not be a good solution, someone who has 1 000 000 ada and someone with 1 000 ada - a huge difference. 

b. there is no description of what this fund will do.

Also, what is the relation of two websites tripXv and ClubXchain and the proposer? Is it already a running service, looking for additional funding? Cooperation companies? Or a possible example where you aim?

Rating given 3.
f6_assessments.q1:
There is not much information about the team except a brief description - this would require more detail and possibly be linked in profiles, some examples of previous projects (for dev)

The video attached does not feel on a professional level, thus it is decreasing the creditability of the proposers. 

visited websites from video, seems to be working. 

Rating given 4.
f6_assessments.q2:
The key metrics are provided with a roadmap.

What I am missing and I consider crucial is a budget distribution. What it will be used for and in what allocation? 

Rating given 3.
f6_assessments.reply: Hi, thanks for the recommendations. We offer combining Booking and Facebook by creating a Cardano network of 2 travel platforms, one financial and one application. The difference from all reservation systems so far is the built-in community and the ability to prevent irregularities related to hygiene in the sites through the presence of files. The video is not professional, we agree. We have a good idea, tourism is a comprehensive economy and would help the development of Cardano. We basically need financial assets for marketing and influencers. I am attaching additional information about the team leader Videlina Gandeva - https://bg.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%92%D0%B8%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%BD%D0%B0_%D0%93%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%B0

f6_assessments.q0: Topically the idea has some interesting possibilities. I see the challenge as a broad based marketing issue which they may have some idea about overcoming. The key challenge here is what actually is the basis of the zero commission and how can it be obtained when you don't explicitly own the assets used to eliminate that cost.
f6_assessments.q1: the proposer seems to understand the challenge of what appears to be only a part of the problem of self booking functionality. It seems challenging to get the community to part with 1% of their monthly income to participate in the program.
f6_assessments.q2: The information provided is limited in its detail which makes it hard to assess the progress and the success of the proposal.
f6_assessments.reply: We will be happy to take a look at our White Paper, on the basis of which we have described the Catalyst project - budget and roadmap https://orfeusnet.eu/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/000_WhitePaper_ORFEUS-Network_EN_07.12.2021.pdf

solution: Cardano De-Fi区块链市场，没有佣金，有电子文件的全球安全旅游网站网络。
experience: 我们的团队包括平台经济的专家、旅游业的专家、区块链软件开发商和加密货币交易商。
